contents.zh-CHS: 收到PING消息后，必须尽快将相应的PONG消息作为回复发送到<server1>（发送PING消息的服务器）。如果指定了<server2>参数，则它表示ping的目标，并将消息转发到该目标。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NOORIGIN ERR_NOSUCHSERVER
contents.zh-CHS: 错误不存在错误不存在服务器

contents.text: Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: PING tolsun.oulu.fi ; Command to send a PING message to server
contents.zh-CHS: PING tolsun.oulu.fi；命令向服务器发送PING消息

contents.text: PING WiZ tolsun.oulu.fi ; Command from WiZ to send a PING message to server "tolsun.oulu.fi"
contents.zh-CHS: PING WiZ tolsun.oulu.fi；WiZ向服务器“tolsun.oulu.fi”发送PING消息的命令

contents.text: PING :irc.funet.fi ; Ping message sent by server "irc.funet.fi"
contents.zh-CHS: PING:irc.funet.fi；服务器“irc.funet.fi”发送的Ping消息

contents.text: 3.7.3 Pong message
contents.zh-CHS: 3.7.3 乒乓球信息

contents.text:
Command: PONG
Parameters: <server> [ <server2> ]

PONG message is a reply to ping message. If parameter <server2> is given, this message MUST be forwarded to given target. The <server> parameter is the name of the entity who has responded to PING message and generated this message.
contents.zh-CHS: PONG消息是对ping消息的回复。如果给定参数<server2>，则必须将此消息转发给给定目标。<server>参数是响应PING消息并生成此消息的实体的名称。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NOORIGIN ERR_NOSUCHSERVER
contents.zh-CHS: 错误不存在错误不存在服务器

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: PONG csd.bu.edu tolsun.oulu.fi ; PONG message from csd.bu.edu to tolsun.oulu.fi
contents.zh-CHS: PONG csd.bu.edu tolsun.oulu.fi；从csd.bu.edu到tolsun.oulu.fi的PONG消息

contents.text: 3.7.4 Error

Command: ERROR
Parameters: <error message>
The ERROR command is for use by servers when reporting a serious or fatal error to its peers. It may also be sent from one server to another but MUST NOT be accepted from any normal unknown clients.
contents.zh-CHS: ERROR命令供服务器在向其对等方报告严重或致命错误时使用。它也可以从一台服务器发送到另一台服务器，但不能从任何正常的未知客户端接受。

contents.text: Only an ERROR message SHOULD be used for reporting errors which occur with a server-to-server link. An ERROR message is sent to the server at the other end (which reports it to appropriate local users and logs) and to appropriate local users and logs. It is not to be passed onto any other servers by a server if it is received from a server.
contents.zh-CHS: 只有错误消息应用于报告服务器到服务器链接中发生的错误。将向另一端的服务器（向相应的本地用户和日志报告）和相应的本地用户和日志发送错误消息。如果它是从服务器接收的，则服务器不会将其传递到任何其他服务器。

contents.text: The ERROR message is also used before terminating a client connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 在终止客户端连接之前也会使用错误消息。

contents.text: When a server sends a received ERROR message to its operators, the message SHOULD be encapsulated inside a NOTICE message, indicating that the client was not responsible for the error.
contents.zh-CHS: 当服务器向其操作员发送接收到的错误消息时，该消息应封装在通知消息中，指示客户端不对错误负责。

contents.text: Numerics:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字：

contents.text: None.
contents.zh-CHS: 没有一个

contents.text: Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: ERROR :Server *.fi already exists ; ERROR message to the other server which caused this error.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误：服务器*.fi已存在；发送给导致此错误的其他服务器的错误消息。

contents.text: NOTICE WiZ :ERROR from csd.bu.edu -- Server *.fi already exists ; Same ERROR message as above but sent to user WiZ on the other server.
contents.zh-CHS: 注意WiZ:csd.bu.edu中的错误——服务器*.fi已经存在；与上述错误消息相同，但已发送到另一台服务器上的用户WiZ。

contents.text: 4. Optional features
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 可选功能

contents.text: This section describes OPTIONAL messages. They are not required in a working server implementation of the protocol described herein. In the absence of the feature, an error reply message MUST be generated or an unknown command error. If the message is destined for another server to answer then it MUST be passed on (elementary parsing REQUIRED) The allocated numerics for this are listed with the messages below.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍可选消息。在本文描述的协议的工作服务器实现中不需要它们。如果没有该功能，则必须生成错误回复消息或未知命令错误。如果消息的目的地是另一台服务器，则必须将其传递（需要进行基本解析）。为此分配的数字与下面的消息一起列出。

contents.text: From this section, only the USERHOST and ISON messages are available to services.
contents.zh-CHS: 在本节中，只有USERHOST和ISON消息可用于服务。

contents.text: 4.1 Away
contents.zh-CHS: 4.1 离开

contents.text:
Command: AWAY
Parameters: [ <text> ]

With the AWAY command, clients can set an automatic reply string for any PRIVMSG commands directed at them (not to a channel they are on). The server sends an automatic reply to the client sending the PRIVMSG command. The only replying server is the one to which the sending client is connected to.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用AWAY命令，客户端可以为指向它们的任何PRIVMSG命令（而不是它们所在的频道）设置自动回复字符串。服务器向发送PRIVMSG命令的客户端发送自动回复。唯一的应答服务器是发送客户端连接到的服务器。

contents.text: The AWAY command is used either with one parameter, to set an AWAY message, or with no parameters, to remove the AWAY message.
contents.zh-CHS: AWAY命令可以与一个参数一起使用，用于设置AWAY消息，也可以不带参数，用于删除AWAY消息。

contents.text: Because of its high cost (memory and bandwidth wise), the AWAY message SHOULD only be used for client-server communication. A server MAY choose to silently ignore AWAY messages received from other servers. To update the away status of a client across servers, the user mode 'a' SHOULD be used instead. (See Section 3.1.5)
contents.zh-CHS: 由于其高成本（内存和带宽方面），离开消息应仅用于客户机-服务器通信。服务器可以选择以静默方式忽略从其他服务器接收的消息。要跨服务器更新客户端的离开状态，应改用用户模式“a”。（见第3.1.5节）

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: RPL_UNAWAY RPL_NOWAWAY
contents.zh-CHS: 绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对绝对

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: AWAY :Gone to lunch. Back in 5 ; Command to set away message to "Gone to lunch. Back in 5".
contents.zh-CHS: 离开：去吃午饭了。回到5岁；命令将消息设置为“去吃午饭，5分钟后回来”。

contents.text: 4.2 Rehash message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.2 重播消息

contents.text: Command: REHASH Parameters: None
contents.zh-CHS: 命令：重新设置参数：无

contents.text: The rehash command is an administrative command which can be used by an operator to force the server to re-read and process its configuration file.
contents.zh-CHS: rehash命令是一个管理命令，操作员可以使用该命令强制服务器重新读取和处理其配置文件。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: RPL_REHASHING ERR_NOPRIVILEGES
contents.zh-CHS: RPL_再灰化错误_无特权

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: REHASH ; message from user with operator status to server asking it to reread its configuration file.
contents.zh-CHS: 再灰化；具有操作员状态的用户向服务器发送的消息，要求服务器重新读取其配置文件。

contents.text: 4.3 Die message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.3 死亡讯息

contents.text: Command: DIE Parameters: None
contents.zh-CHS: 命令：模具参数：无

contents.text: An operator can use the DIE command to shutdown the server. This message is optional since it may be viewed as a risk to allow arbitrary people to connect to a server as an operator and execute this command.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作员可以使用DIE命令关闭服务器。此消息是可选的，因为它可能被视为允许任意人员作为操作员连接到服务器并执行此命令的风险。

contents.text: The DIE command MUST always be fully processed by the server to which the sending client is connected and MUST NOT be passed onto other connected servers.
contents.zh-CHS: DIE命令必须始终由发送客户端所连接的服务器完全处理，并且不得传递到其他连接的服务器。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NOPRIVILEGES
contents.zh-CHS: 厄尔诺特权

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: DIE ; no parameters required.
contents.zh-CHS: 死亡不需要参数。

contents.text: 4.4 Restart message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.4 重新启动消息

contents.text: Command: RESTART Parameters: None
contents.zh-CHS: 命令：重新启动参数：无

contents.text: An operator can use the restart command to force the server to restart itself. This message is optional since it may be viewed as a risk to allow arbitrary people to connect to a server as an operator and execute this command, causing (at least) a disruption to service.
contents.zh-CHS: 操作员可以使用restart命令强制服务器重新启动自身。此消息是可选的，因为它可能被视为允许任意人员作为操作员连接到服务器并执行此命令的风险，从而导致（至少）服务中断。

contents.text: The RESTART command MUST always be fully processed by the server to which the sending client is connected and MUST NOT be passed onto other connected servers.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新启动命令必须始终由发送客户端所连接的服务器完全处理，并且不得传递到其他连接的服务器。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NOPRIVILEGES
contents.zh-CHS: 厄尔诺特权

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: RESTART ; no parameters required.
contents.zh-CHS: 重新启动；不需要参数。

contents.text: 4.5 Summon message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.5 召唤信息

contents.text:
Command: SUMMON
Parameters: <user> [ <target> [ <channel> ] ]

The SUMMON command can be used to give users who are on a host running an IRC server a message asking them to please join IRC. This message is only sent if the target server (a) has SUMMON enabled, (b) the user is logged in and (c) the server process can write to the user's tty (or similar).
contents.zh-CHS: 召唤命令可用于向运行IRC服务器的主机上的用户发送一条消息，要求他们加入IRC。仅当目标服务器（a）已启用召唤，（b）用户已登录，并且（c）服务器进程可以写入用户的tty（或类似）时，才会发送此消息。

contents.text: If no <server> parameter is given it tries to summon <user> from the server the client is connected to is assumed as the target.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果未给出<server>参数，则会尝试从客户端连接的服务器调用<user>，并将其视为目标。

contents.text: If summon is not enabled in a server, it MUST return the ERR_SUMMONDISABLED numeric.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果服务器中未启用召唤，则必须返回ERR_召唤禁用数字。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NORECIPIENT ERR_FILEERROR ERR_NOLOGIN ERR_NOSUCHSERVER ERR_SUMMONDISABLED RPL_SUMMONING
contents.zh-CHS: 错误\u非特定错误\u文件错误\u NOLOGIN错误\u nosuch服务器错误\u调用已禁用RPL\u调用

contents.text: Examples:
contents.zh-CHS: 示例：

contents.text: SUMMON jto ; summon user jto on the server's host
contents.zh-CHS: 传唤jto；在服务器主机上调用用户jto

contents.text: SUMMON jto tolsun.oulu.fi ; summon user jto on the host which a server named "tolsun.oulu.fi" is running.
contents.zh-CHS: 传唤jto tolsun.oulu.fi；在名为“tolsun.oulu.fi”的服务器正在运行的主机上调用用户jto。

contents.text: 4.6 Users
contents.zh-CHS: 4.6 使用者

contents.text:
Command: USERS
Parameters: [ <target> ]

The USERS command returns a list of users logged into the server in a format similar to the UNIX commands who(1), rusers(1) and finger(1). If disabled, the correct numeric MUST be returned to indicate this.
contents.zh-CHS: USERS命令返回登录到服务器的用户列表，其格式类似于UNIX命令who（1）、rusers（1）和finger（1）。如果禁用，则必须返回正确的数字以指示此情况。

contents.text: Because of the security implications of such a command, it SHOULD be disabled by default in server implementations. Enabling it SHOULD require recompiling the server or some equivalent change rather than simply toggling an option and restarting the server. The procedure to enable this command SHOULD also include suitable large comments.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于这种命令的安全性，在服务器实现中默认情况下应该禁用它。启用它应该需要重新编译服务器或进行一些等效的更改，而不是简单地切换一个选项并重新启动服务器。启用此命令的过程还应包括适当的大注释。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NOSUCHSERVER ERR_FILEERROR RPL_USERSSTART RPL_USERS RPL_NOUSERS RPL_ENDOFUSERS ERR_USERSDISABLED
contents.zh-CHS: 错误\u nosuch服务器错误\u文件错误RPL\u用户启动RPL\u用户RPL\u用户RPL\u内聚器错误\u用户禁用

contents.text: Disabled Reply:
contents.zh-CHS: 答复:

contents.text: ERR_USERSDISABLED
contents.zh-CHS: 错误用户禁用

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: USERS eff.org ; request a list of users logged in on server eff.org
contents.zh-CHS: 用户eff.org；请求登录服务器eff.org的用户列表

contents.text: 4.7 Operwall message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.7 操作墙消息

contents.text:
Command: WALLOPS
Parameters: <Text to be sent>
The WALLOPS command is used to send a message to all currently connected users who have set the 'w' user mode for themselves. (See Section 3.1.5 "User modes").
contents.zh-CHS: WALLOPS命令用于向所有已为自己设置“w”用户模式的当前连接用户发送消息。（见第3.1.5节“用户模式”）。

contents.text: After implementing WALLOPS as a user command it was found that it was often and commonly abused as a means of sending a message to a lot of people. Due to this, it is RECOMMENDED that the implementation of WALLOPS allows and recognizes only servers as the originators of WALLOPS.
contents.zh-CHS: 在将WALLOPS作为一个用户命令实现后，人们发现它经常被滥用，被当作向许多人发送消息的手段。因此，建议WALLOPS的实施只允许并承认服务器是WALLOPS的发起人。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: ERR_NEEDMOREPARAMS
contents.zh-CHS: 错误需要更多参数

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: :csd.bu.edu WALLOPS :Connect '*.uiuc.edu 6667' from Joshua ; WALLOPS message from csd.bu.edu announcing a CONNECT message it received from Joshua and acted upon.
contents.zh-CHS: ：csd.bu.edu WALLOPS：连接Joshua的“*.uiuc.edu 6667”；来自csd.bu.edu的WALLOPS消息，宣布从Joshua收到连接消息并采取行动。

contents.text: 4.8 Userhost message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.8 用户主机消息

contents.text:
Command: USERHOST
Parameters: <nickname> *( SPACE <nickname> )

The USERHOST command takes a list of up to 5 nicknames, each separated by a space character and returns a list of information about each nickname that it found. The returned list has each reply separated by a space.
contents.zh-CHS: USERHOST命令获取最多5个昵称的列表，每个昵称由空格字符分隔，并返回找到的每个昵称的信息列表。返回的列表中的每个回复都用空格分隔。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: RPL_USERHOST ERR_NEEDMOREPARAMS
contents.zh-CHS: RPL\u用户主机错误\u需要更多参数

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: USERHOST Wiz Michael syrk ; USERHOST request for information on nicks "Wiz", "Michael", and "syrk"
contents.zh-CHS: 用户主机wizmichaelsyrk；USERHOST请求有关nicks“Wiz”、“Michael”和“syrk”的信息

contents.text:
:ircd.stealth.net 302 yournick :syrk=+syrk@millennium.stealth.net
                                ; Reply for user syrk
4.9 Ison message
contents.zh-CHS: 4.9 伊森电文

contents.text:
Command: ISON
Parameters: <nickname> *( SPACE <nickname> )

The ISON command was implemented to provide a quick and efficient means to get a response about whether a given nickname was currently on IRC. ISON only takes one (1) type of parameter: a space-separated list of nicks. For each nickname in the list that is present, the
contents.zh-CHS: 实现ISON命令是为了提供一种快速有效的方法来获取关于给定昵称当前是否在IRC上的响应。ISON只接受一（1）种类型的参数：以空格分隔的刻痕列表。对于列表中存在的每个昵称

contents.text: server adds that to its reply string. Thus the reply string may return empty (none of the given nicks are present), an exact copy of the parameter string (all of them present) or any other subset of the set of nicks given in the parameter. The only limit on the number of nicks that may be checked is that the combined length MUST NOT be too large as to cause the server to chop it off so it fits in 512 characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 服务器将其添加到其回复字符串中。因此，应答字符串可能返回空（不存在任何给定刻痕）、参数字符串的精确副本（所有刻痕都存在）或参数中给定刻痕集的任何其他子集。可以检查的刻痕数量的唯一限制是，组合长度不能太大，以免导致服务器将其切掉，以适合512个字符。

contents.text: ISON is only processed by the server local to the client sending the command and thus not passed onto other servers for further processing.
contents.zh-CHS: ISON仅由发送命令的客户端本地服务器处理，因此不会传递到其他服务器进行进一步处理。

contents.text: Numeric Replies:
contents.zh-CHS: 数字回复：

contents.text: RPL_ISON ERR_NEEDMOREPARAMS
contents.zh-CHS: RPL_ISON ERR_needmore参数

contents.text: Example:
contents.zh-CHS: 例子：

contents.text: ISON phone trillian WiZ jarlek Avalon Angel Monstah syrk ; Sample ISON request for 7 nicks.
contents.zh-CHS: 伊森·电话特里利安·威兹·贾勒克·阿瓦隆·安吉尔·蒙斯塔·塞尔克；7个缺口的样品要求。

contents.text: 5. Replies
contents.zh-CHS: 5. 答复

contents.text: The following is a list of numeric replies which are generated in response to the commands given above. Each numeric is given with its number, name and reply string.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是响应上述命令生成的数字回复列表。每个数字都有其编号、名称和回复字符串。

contents.text: 5.1 Command responses
contents.zh-CHS: 5.1 命令响应

contents.text: Numerics in the range from 001 to 099 are used for client-server connections only and should never travel between servers. Replies generated in the response to commands are found in the range from 200 to 399.
contents.zh-CHS: 001到099范围内的数字仅用于客户端-服务器连接，不应在服务器之间移动。在对命令的响应中生成的回复范围为200到399。

contents.text:
001    RPL_WELCOME
       "Welcome to the Internet Relay Network
        <nick>!<user>@<host>"
002    RPL_YOURHOST
       "Your host is <servername>, running version <ver>"
003    RPL_CREATED
       "This server was created <date>"
004    RPL_MYINFO
       "<servername> <version> <available user modes>
        <available channel modes>"
- The server sends Replies 001 to 004 to a user upon successful registration.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功注册后，服务器向用户发送回复001到004。

contents.text:
005    RPL_BOUNCE
       "Try server <server name>, port <port number>"
- Sent by the server to a user to suggest an alternative server. This is often used when the connection is refused because the server is already full.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器发送给用户以建议替代服务器。当由于服务器已满而拒绝连接时，通常使用此选项。

contents.text:
302    RPL_USERHOST
       ":*1<reply> *( " " <reply> )"
- Reply format used by USERHOST to list replies to the query list. The reply string is composed as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: - USERHOST用于列出对查询列表的答复的答复格式。回复字符串的组成如下所示：

contents.text: reply = nickname [ "*" ] "=" ( "+" / "-" ) hostname
The '*' indicates whether the client has registered as an Operator. The '-' or '+' characters represent whether the client has set an AWAY message or not respectively.
contents.zh-CHS: “*”表示客户端是否已注册为操作员。“-”或“+”字符分别表示客户机是否设置了离开消息。

contents.text:
303    RPL_ISON
       ":*1<nick> *( " " <nick> )"
- Reply format used by ISON to list replies to the query list.
contents.zh-CHS: - ISON用于列出对查询列表的答复的答复格式。

contents.text: 301 RPL_AWAY "<nick> :<away message>" 305 RPL_UNAWAY ":You are no longer marked as being away" 306 RPL_NOWAWAY ":You have been marked as being away"
contents.zh-CHS: 301 RPL_离开“<nick>：<AWAY message>“305 RPL_UNAWAY”：您不再被标记为离开“306 RPL_NOWAWAY”：您已被标记为离开”

contents.text: - These replies are used with the AWAY command (if allowed). RPL_AWAY is sent to any client sending a PRIVMSG to a client which is away. RPL_AWAY is only sent by the server to which the client is connected. Replies RPL_UNAWAY and RPL_NOWAWAY are sent when the client removes and sets an AWAY message.
contents.zh-CHS: - 这些回复与AWAY命令一起使用（如果允许）。RPL_AWAY发送给任何向不在的客户端发送PRIVMSG的客户端。RPL_AWAY仅由客户端连接的服务器发送。当客户端删除并设置一条离开消息时，将发送回复RPL_unway和RPL_NOWAWAY。

contents.text:
311    RPL_WHOISUSER
       "<nick> <user> <host> * :<real name>"
312    RPL_WHOISSERVER
       "<nick> <server> :<server info>"
313    RPL_WHOISOPERATOR
       "<nick> :is an IRC operator"

317    RPL_WHOISIDLE
       "<nick> <integer> :seconds idle"
318    RPL_ENDOFWHOIS
       "<nick> :End of WHOIS list"
319    RPL_WHOISCHANNELS
       "<nick> :*( ( "@" / "+" ) <channel> " " )"

- Replies 311 - 313, 317 - 319 are all replies generated in response to a WHOIS message. Given that there are enough parameters present, the answering server MUST either formulate a reply out of the above numerics (if the query nick is found) or return an error reply. The '*' in RPL_WHOISUSER is there as the literal character and not as a wild card. For each reply set, only RPL_WHOISCHANNELS may appear more than once (for long lists of channel names). The '@' and '+' characters next to the channel name indicate whether a client is a channel operator or has been granted permission to speak on a moderated channel. The RPL_ENDOFWHOIS reply is used to mark the end of processing a WHOIS message.
contents.zh-CHS: - 回复311-313、317-319都是响应WHOIS消息生成的回复。假设存在足够的参数，应答服务器必须从上述数字中得出一个应答（如果找到查询缺口），或者返回一个错误应答。RPL_WHOISUSER中的“*”作为文字字符而不是通配符存在。对于每个回复集，只有RPL_whoischnels可以出现多次（对于通道名称的长列表）。频道名称旁边的“@”和“+”字符表示客户端是频道运营商还是已被授予在主持人频道上讲话的权限。RPL_endofhois回复用于标记WHOIS消息处理的结束。

contents.text:
314    RPL_WHOWASUSER
       "<nick> <user> <host> * :<real name>"
369    RPL_ENDOFWHOWAS
       "<nick> :End of WHOWAS"

- When replying to a WHOWAS message, a server MUST use the replies RPL_WHOWASUSER, RPL_WHOISSERVER or ERR_WASNOSUCHNICK for each nickname in the presented list. At the end of all reply batches, there MUST be RPL_ENDOFWHOWAS (even if there was only one reply and it was an error).
contents.zh-CHS: - 在回复WHOWAS消息时，服务器必须对显示列表中的每个昵称使用回复RPL_WHOWASUSER、RPL_WHOISSERVER或ERR_WASNOSUCHNICK。在所有回复批处理结束时，必须有RPL_endofwhoas（即使只有一个回复并且是错误）。

contents.text: 321 RPL_LISTSTART Obsolete. Not used.
contents.zh-CHS: 321 RPL_列表开始过时。没有用。

contents.text:
322    RPL_LIST
       "<channel> <# visible> :<topic>"
323    RPL_LISTEND
       ":End of LIST"
- Replies RPL_LIST, RPL_LISTEND mark the actual replies with data and end of the server's response to a LIST command. If there are no channels available to return, only the end reply MUST be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 回复RPL_列表，RPL_列表使用数据标记实际回复，并结束服务器对LIST命令的响应。如果没有可返回的频道，则只需发送结束回复。

contents.text:
325    RPL_UNIQOPIS
       "<channel> <nickname>"

324    RPL_CHANNELMODEIS
       "<channel> <mode> <mode params>"

331    RPL_NOTOPIC
       "<channel> :No topic is set"
332    RPL_TOPIC
       "<channel> :<topic>"
- When sending a TOPIC message to determine the channel topic, one of two replies is sent. If the topic is set, RPL_TOPIC is sent back else RPL_NOTOPIC.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送主题消息以确定频道主题时，将发送两个回复中的一个。如果设置了主题，则会将RPL\U主题发送回else RPL\U NOTOPIC。

contents.text:
341    RPL_INVITING
       "<channel> <nick>"
- Returned by the server to indicate that the attempted INVITE message was successful and is being passed onto the end client.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器返回，以指示尝试的INVITE消息已成功并正在传递到最终客户端。

contents.text: 342 RPL_SUMMONING "<user> :Summoning user to IRC"
contents.zh-CHS: 342 RPL_召唤“<user>：召唤用户到IRC”

contents.text: - Returned by a server answering a SUMMON message to indicate that it is summoning that user.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由响应召唤消息的服务器返回，以指示它正在召唤该用户。

contents.text:
346    RPL_INVITELIST
       "<channel> <invitemask>"
347    RPL_ENDOFINVITELIST
       "<channel> :End of channel invite list"

- When listing the 'invitations masks' for a given channel, a server is required to send the list back using the RPL_INVITELIST and RPL_ENDOFINVITELIST messages. A separate RPL_INVITELIST is sent for each active mask. After the masks have been listed (or if none present) a RPL_ENDOFINVITELIST MUST be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 列出给定频道的“邀请掩码”时，服务器需要使用RPL_INVITELIST和RPL_ENDOFINVITELIST消息将列表发回。为每个活动掩码发送单独的RPL\U邀请列表。列出屏蔽后（或如果不存在），必须发送RPL_ENDOFINVITELIST。

contents.text:
348    RPL_EXCEPTLIST
       "<channel> <exceptionmask>"
349    RPL_ENDOFEXCEPTLIST
       "<channel> :End of channel exception list"

- When listing the 'exception masks' for a given channel, a server is required to send the list back using the RPL_EXCEPTLIST and RPL_ENDOFEXCEPTLIST messages. A separate RPL_EXCEPTLIST is sent for each active mask. After the masks have been listed (or if none present) a RPL_ENDOFEXCEPTLIST MUST be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 列出给定通道的“异常掩码”时，服务器需要使用RPL_EXCEPTLIST和RPL_ENDOFEXCEPTLIST消息将列表发回。为每个活动掩码发送单独的RPL_EXCEPTLIST。列出屏蔽后（或如果不存在），必须发送RPL_ENDOFEXCEPTLIST。

contents.text:
351    RPL_VERSION
       "<version>.<debuglevel> <server> :<comments>"

- Reply by the server showing its version details. The <version> is the version of the software being used (including any patchlevel revisions) and the <debuglevel> is used to indicate if the server is running in "debug mode".
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务器回复，显示其版本详细信息。<version>是正在使用的软件版本（包括任何补丁级别的修订版），而<debuglevel>用于指示服务器是否在“调试模式”下运行。

contents.text: The "comments" field may contain any comments about the version or further version details.
contents.zh-CHS: “注释”字段可能包含有关版本或进一步版本详细信息的任何注释。

contents.text:
352    RPL_WHOREPLY
       "<channel> <user> <host> <server> <nick>
       ( "H" / "G" > ["*"] [ ( "@" / "+" ) ]
       :<hopcount> <real name>"
315 RPL_ENDOFWHO "<name> :End of WHO list"
contents.zh-CHS: 315 RPL_ENDOFWHO“<name>：世界卫生组织名单结束”

contents.text: - The RPL_WHOREPLY and RPL_ENDOFWHO pair are used to answer a WHO message. The RPL_WHOREPLY is only sent if there is an appropriate match to the WHO query. If there is a list of parameters supplied with a WHO message, a RPL_ENDOFWHO MUST be sent after processing each list item with <name> being the item.
contents.zh-CHS: - RPL_WHOREPLY和RPL_ENDOFWHO对用于回答世卫组织的信息。只有在与WHO查询有适当匹配的情况下，才会发送RPL_WHOREPLY。如果世卫组织信息中提供了参数列表，则必须在处理每个列表项后发送RPL_ENDOFWHO，其中<name>为该项。

contents.text:
353    RPL_NAMREPLY
       "( "=" / "*" / "@" ) <channel>
        :[ "@" / "+" ] <nick> *( " " [ "@" / "+" ] <nick> )
  - "@" is used for secret channels, "*" for private
    channels, and "=" for others (public channels).
366 RPL_ENDOFNAMES "<channel> :End of NAMES list"
contents.zh-CHS: 366 RPL_ENDOFNAMES“<channel>：名称列表末尾”

contents.text: - To reply to a NAMES message, a reply pair consisting of RPL_NAMREPLY and RPL_ENDOFNAMES is sent by the server back to the client. If there is no channel found as in the query, then only RPL_ENDOFNAMES is
contents.zh-CHS: - 要回复NAMES消息，服务器会将包含RPL_NAMREPLY和RPL_ENDOFNAMES的回复对发送回客户端。如果在查询中没有找到通道，则只显示RPL_ENDOFNAMES

contents.text: returned. The exception to this is when a NAMES message is sent with no parameters and all visible channels and contents are sent back in a series of RPL_NAMEREPLY messages with a RPL_ENDOFNAMES to mark the end.
contents.zh-CHS: 返回。例外情况是，如果发送的NAMES消息没有参数，并且所有可见的通道和内容都以一系列RPL_NAMEREPLY消息的形式发送回来，并以RPL_ENDOFNAMES标记结束。

contents.text:
364    RPL_LINKS
       "<mask> <server> :<hopcount> <server info>"
365    RPL_ENDOFLINKS
       "<mask> :End of LINKS list"
- In replying to the LINKS message, a server MUST send replies back using the RPL_LINKS numeric and mark the end of the list using an RPL_ENDOFLINKS reply.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在回复LINKS消息时，服务器必须使用RPL_LINKS数字发送回复，并使用RPL_ENDOFLINKS回复标记列表的结尾。

contents.text:
367    RPL_BANLIST
       "<channel> <banmask>"
368    RPL_ENDOFBANLIST
       "<channel> :End of channel ban list"

- When listing the active 'bans' for a given channel, a server is required to send the list back using the RPL_BANLIST and RPL_ENDOFBANLIST messages. A separate RPL_BANLIST is sent for each active banmask. After the banmasks have been listed (or if none present) a RPL_ENDOFBANLIST MUST be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 列出给定通道的活动“禁止”时，服务器需要使用RPL_BANLIST和RPL_ENDOFBANLIST消息将列表发送回。为每个活动的banmask发送单独的RPL_BANLIST。列出屏蔽后（或如果不存在），必须发送RPL_ENDOFBANLIST。

contents.text: 371 RPL_INFO ":<string>" 374 RPL_ENDOFINFO ":End of INFO list"
contents.zh-CHS: 371 RPL_信息“：<string>“374 RPL_ENDOFINFO”：信息列表结束

contents.text: - A server responding to an INFO message is required to send all its 'info' in a series of RPL_INFO messages with a RPL_ENDOFINFO reply to indicate the end of the replies.
contents.zh-CHS: - 响应INFO消息的服务器需要发送一系列RPL_INFO消息中的所有“INFO”，并使用RPL_ENDOFINFO回复来指示回复的结束。

contents.text:
375    RPL_MOTDSTART
       ":- <server> Message of the day - "
372    RPL_MOTD
       ":- <text>"
376    RPL_ENDOFMOTD
       ":End of MOTD command"
- When responding to the MOTD message and the MOTD file is found, the file is displayed line by line, with each line no longer than 80 characters, using
contents.zh-CHS: - 当响应MOTD消息并找到MOTD文件时，文件逐行显示，每行长度不超过80个字符，使用

contents.text: RPL_MOTD format replies. These MUST be surrounded by a RPL_MOTDSTART (before the RPL_MOTDs) and an RPL_ENDOFMOTD (after).
contents.zh-CHS: RPL_MOTD格式回复。这些必须由RPL_MOTDSTART（在RPL_MOTDs之前）和RPL_ENDOFMOTD（在RPL_MOTDs之后）包围。

contents.text: 381 RPL_YOUREOPER ":You are now an IRC operator"
contents.zh-CHS: 381 RPL_YOUREOPER：“您现在是IRC操作员”

contents.text: - RPL_YOUREOPER is sent back to a client which has just successfully issued an OPER message and gained operator status.
contents.zh-CHS: - RPL_YOUREOPER被发送回刚刚成功发出OPER消息并获得操作员状态的客户端。

contents.text: 382 RPL_REHASHING "<config file> :Rehashing"
contents.zh-CHS: 382 RPL_重新灰化“<config file>：重新灰化”

contents.text: - If the REHASH option is used and an operator sends a REHASH message, an RPL_REHASHING is sent back to the operator.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果使用REHASH选项，并且操作员发送REHASH消息，则RPL_REHASHING将发送回操作员。

contents.text: 383 RPL_YOURESERVICE "You are service <servicename>"
contents.zh-CHS: 383 RPL_YOURESERVICE“您是服务<servicename>”

contents.text: - Sent by the server to a service upon successful registration.
contents.zh-CHS: - 成功注册后由服务器发送到服务。

contents.text:
391    RPL_TIME
       "<server> :<string showing server's local time>"

- When replying to the TIME message, a server MUST send the reply using the RPL_TIME format above. The string showing the time need only contain the correct day and time there. There is no further requirement for the time string.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当回复时间消息时，服务器必须使用上面的RPL_时间格式发送回复。显示时间的字符串只需包含正确的日期和时间。对时间字符串没有进一步的要求。

contents.text:
392    RPL_USERSSTART
       ":UserID   Terminal  Host"
393    RPL_USERS
       ":<username> <ttyline> <hostname>"
394    RPL_ENDOFUSERS
       ":End of users"
395    RPL_NOUSERS
       ":Nobody logged in"

- If the USERS message is handled by a server, the replies RPL_USERSTART, RPL_USERS, RPL_ENDOFUSERS and RPL_NOUSERS are used. RPL_USERSSTART MUST be sent first, following by either a sequence of RPL_USERS or a single RPL_NOUSER. Following this is RPL_ENDOFUSERS.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果用户消息由服务器处理，则使用回复RPL_USERSTART、RPL_USERS、RPL_ENDOFUSERS和RPL_nouser。必须首先发送RPL_用户启动，然后是一系列RPL_用户或单个RPL_用户。下面是RPL_内融合器。

contents.text:
200    RPL_TRACELINK
       "Link <version & debug level> <destination>
        <next server> V<protocol version>
        <link uptime in seconds> <backstream sendq>
        <upstream sendq>"
201    RPL_TRACECONNECTING
       "Try. <class> <server>"
202    RPL_TRACEHANDSHAKE
       "H.S. <class> <server>"
203    RPL_TRACEUNKNOWN
       "???? <class> [<client IP address in dot form>]"
204    RPL_TRACEOPERATOR
       "Oper <class> <nick>"
205    RPL_TRACEUSER
       "User <class> <nick>"
206    RPL_TRACESERVER
       "Serv <class> <int>S <int>C <server>
        <nick!user|*!*>@<host|server> V<protocol version>"
207    RPL_TRACESERVICE
       "Service <class> <name> <type> <active type>"
208    RPL_TRACENEWTYPE
       "<newtype> 0 <client name>"
209    RPL_TRACECLASS
       "Class <class> <count>"
210    RPL_TRACERECONNECT
       Unused.
261    RPL_TRACELOG
       "File <logfile> <debug level>"
262    RPL_TRACEEND
       "<server name> <version & debug level> :End of TRACE"

- The RPL_TRACE* are all returned by the server in response to the TRACE message. How many are returned is dependent on the TRACE message and whether it was sent by an operator or not. There is no predefined order for which occurs first. Replies RPL_TRACEUNKNOWN, RPL_TRACECONNECTING and RPL_TRACEHANDSHAKE are all used for connections which have not been fully established and are either unknown, still attempting to connect or in the process of completing the 'server handshake'. RPL_TRACELINK is sent by any server which handles a TRACE message and has to pass it on to another server. The list of RPL_TRACELINKs sent in response to a TRACE command traversing the IRC network should reflect the actual connectivity of the servers themselves along that path.
contents.zh-CHS: - RPL_跟踪*都由服务器返回以响应跟踪消息。返回的数量取决于跟踪消息以及它是否由操作员发送。没有先出现的预定义顺序。回复RPL_TRACEUNKNOWN、RPL_TraceConnection和RPL_TRACEHANDSHAKE均用于尚未完全建立的连接，这些连接未知、仍在尝试连接或正在完成“服务器握手”。RPL_TRACELINK由处理跟踪消息的任何服务器发送，并且必须将其传递到另一台服务器。为响应穿越IRC网络的跟踪命令而发送的RPL_跟踪线列表应反映服务器本身沿该路径的实际连接。

contents.text: RPL_TRACENEWTYPE is to be used for any connection which does not fit in the other categories but is being displayed anyway. RPL_TRACEEND is sent to indicate the end of the list.
contents.zh-CHS: RPL_TRACENEWTYPE用于任何不适合其他类别但仍在显示的连接。发送RPL_TRACEEND以指示列表结束。

contents.text:
211    RPL_STATSLINKINFO
       "<linkname> <sendq> <sent messages>
        <sent Kbytes> <received messages>
        <received Kbytes> <time open>"

- reports statistics on a connection. <linkname> identifies the particular connection, <sendq> is the amount of data that is queued and waiting to be sent <sent messages> the number of messages sent, and <sent Kbytes> the amount of data sent, in Kbytes. <received messages> and <received Kbytes> are the equivalent of <sent messages> and <sent Kbytes> for received data, respectively. <time open> indicates how long ago the connection was opened, in seconds.
contents.zh-CHS: - 报告连接的统计信息<linkname>标识特定连接，<sendq>是排队等待发送的数据量<sent messages>发送的消息数，<sent Kbytes>发送的数据量，单位为Kbytes<接收到的消息>和<received Kbytes>分别相当于接收到的数据的<sent messages>和<sent Kbytes><time open>表示连接打开的时间，以秒为单位。

contents.text:
212    RPL_STATSCOMMANDS
       "<command> <count> <byte count> <remote count>"
- reports statistics on commands usage.
contents.zh-CHS: - 报告命令使用情况的统计信息。

contents.text: 219 RPL_ENDOFSTATS "<stats letter> :End of STATS report"
contents.zh-CHS: 219 RPL_ENDOFSTATS“<stats letter>：统计报告结束”

contents.text: 242 RPL_STATSUPTIME ":Server Up %d days %d:%02d:%02d"
contents.zh-CHS: 242 RPL_STATSUPTIME“：服务器启动%d天%d:%02d:%02d”

contents.text: - reports the server uptime.
contents.zh-CHS: - 报告服务器正常运行时间。

contents.text:
243    RPL_STATSOLINE
       "O <hostmask> * <name>"
- reports the allowed hosts from where user may become IRC operators.
contents.zh-CHS: - 报告用户可能成为IRC操作员的允许主机。

contents.text: 221 RPL_UMODEIS "<user mode string>"
contents.zh-CHS: 221 RPL_UMODEIS“<user mode string>”

contents.text: - To answer a query about a client's own mode, RPL_UMODEIS is sent back.
contents.zh-CHS: - 要回答有关客户端自身模式的查询，将返回RPL_UMODEIS。

contents.text:
234    RPL_SERVLIST
       "<name> <server> <mask> <type> <hopcount> <info>"

235    RPL_SERVLISTEND
       "<mask> <type> :End of service listing"

- When listing services in reply to a SERVLIST message, a server is required to send the list back using the RPL_SERVLIST and RPL_SERVLISTEND messages. A separate RPL_SERVLIST is sent for each service. After the services have been listed (or if none present) a RPL_SERVLISTEND MUST be sent.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当列出服务以回复SERVLIST消息时，服务器需要使用RPL_SERVLIST和RPL_SERVLISTEND消息将列表发送回。为每个服务发送一个单独的RPL_服务列表。列出服务后（或如果不存在），必须发送RPL_SERVLISTEND。

contents.text:
251    RPL_LUSERCLIENT
       ":There are <integer> users and <integer>
        services on <integer> servers"
252    RPL_LUSEROP
       "<integer> :operator(s) online"
253    RPL_LUSERUNKNOWN
       "<integer> :unknown connection(s)"
254    RPL_LUSERCHANNELS
       "<integer> :channels formed"
255    RPL_LUSERME
       ":I have <integer> clients and <integer>
         servers"

- In processing an LUSERS message, the server sends a set of replies from RPL_LUSERCLIENT, RPL_LUSEROP, RPL_USERUNKNOWN, RPL_LUSERCHANNELS and RPL_LUSERME. When replying, a server MUST send back RPL_LUSERCLIENT and RPL_LUSERME. The other replies are only sent back if a non-zero count is found for them.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在处理LUSERS消息时，服务器从RPL_LUSERCLIENT、RPL_LUSEROP、RPL_USERUNKNOWN、RPL_LUSERCHANNELS和RPL_LUSERME发送一组回复。应答时，服务器必须发回RPL_LUSERCLIENT和RPL_LUSERME。其他回复只有在找到非零计数时才会被发回。

contents.text:
256    RPL_ADMINME
       "<server> :Administrative info"
257    RPL_ADMINLOC1
       ":<admin info>"
258    RPL_ADMINLOC2
       ":<admin info>"
259    RPL_ADMINEMAIL
       ":<admin info>"

- When replying to an ADMIN message, a server is expected to use replies RPL_ADMINME through to RPL_ADMINEMAIL and provide a text message with each. For RPL_ADMINLOC1 a description of what city, state and country the server is in is expected, followed by details of the institution (RPL_ADMINLOC2)
contents.zh-CHS: - 在回复管理员邮件时，服务器应使用RPL_ADMINME至RPL_ADMINEMAIL的回复，并为每个回复提供文本消息。对于RPL_ADMINLOC1，需要描述服务器所在的城市、州和国家，然后是机构的详细信息（RPL_ADMINLOC2）

contents.text: and finally the administrative contact for the server (an email address here is REQUIRED) in RPL_ADMINEMAIL.
contents.zh-CHS: 最后是RPL_ADMINEMAIL中服务器的管理联系人（此处需要电子邮件地址）。

contents.text: 263 RPL_TRYAGAIN "<command> :Please wait a while and try again."
contents.zh-CHS: 263 RPL_TRYAGAIN“<command>：请稍等片刻，然后重试。”

contents.text: - When a server drops a command without processing it, it MUST use the reply RPL_TRYAGAIN to inform the originating client.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当服务器在不处理命令的情况下丢弃命令时，它必须使用reply RPL_TRYAGAIN通知发起客户端。

contents.text: 5.2 Error Replies
contents.zh-CHS: 5.2 错误回复

contents.text: Error replies are found in the range from 400 to 599.
contents.zh-CHS: 错误回复的范围从400到599。

contents.text:
401    ERR_NOSUCHNICK
       "<nickname> :No such nick/channel"
- Used to indicate the nickname parameter supplied to a command is currently unused.
contents.zh-CHS: - 用于指示提供给命令的昵称参数当前未使用。

contents.text: 402 ERR_NOSUCHSERVER "<server name> :No such server"
contents.zh-CHS: 402 ERR_NOSUCHSERVER“<server name>：没有这样的服务器”

contents.text: - Used to indicate the server name given currently does not exist.
contents.zh-CHS: - 用于指示当前给定的服务器名称不存在。

contents.text: 403 ERR_NOSUCHCHANNEL "<channel name> :No such channel"
contents.zh-CHS: 403 ERR_nosuch频道“<channel name>：没有这样的频道”

contents.text: - Used to indicate the given channel name is invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: - 用于指示给定的通道名称无效。

contents.text: 404 ERR_CANNOTSENDTOCHAN "<channel name> :Cannot send to channel"
contents.zh-CHS: 404 ERR_CANNOTSENDTOCHAN“<channel name>：无法发送到频道”

contents.text: - Sent to a user who is either (a) not on a channel which is mode +n or (b) not a chanop (or mode +v) on a channel which has mode +m set or where the user is banned and is trying to send a PRIVMSG message to that channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送给以下用户：（a）不在模式+n的频道上，或（b）不在模式+m设置的频道上，或用户被禁止并试图向该频道发送PRIVMSG消息的频道上（或模式+v）。

contents.text: 405 ERR_TOOMANYCHANNELS "<channel name> :You have joined too many channels"
contents.zh-CHS: 405 ERR_ToomanyChannel“<channel name>：您加入的频道太多”

contents.text: - Sent to a user when they have joined the maximum number of allowed channels and they try to join another channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当用户加入了允许的最大频道数并尝试加入另一个频道时发送给用户。

contents.text: 406 ERR_WASNOSUCHNICK "<nickname> :There was no such nickname"
contents.zh-CHS: 406 ERR_WASNOSUCHNICK“<昵称>：没有这样的昵称”

contents.text: - Returned by WHOWAS to indicate there is no history information for that nickname.
contents.zh-CHS: - WHOWAS返回，表示该昵称没有历史信息。

contents.text:
407    ERR_TOOMANYTARGETS
       "<target> :<error code> recipients. <abort message>"
- Returned to a client which is attempting to send a PRIVMSG/NOTICE using the user@host destination format and for a user@host which has several occurrences.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回给正在尝试使用发送PRIVMSG/通知的客户端user@host目标格式和user@host有好几次。

contents.text: - Returned to a client which trying to send a PRIVMSG/NOTICE to too many recipients.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回到试图向太多收件人发送PRIVMSG/通知的客户端。

contents.text: - Returned to a client which is attempting to JOIN a safe channel using the shortname when there are more than one such channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当存在多个安全通道时，返回给试图使用shortname加入安全通道的客户端。

contents.text: 408 ERR_NOSUCHSERVICE "<service name> :No such service"
contents.zh-CHS: 408 ERR_NOSUCHSERVICE“<service name>：无此类服务”

contents.text: - Returned to a client which is attempting to send a SQUERY to a service which does not exist.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回给试图向不存在的服务发送SQUERY的客户端。

contents.text: 409 ERR_NOORIGIN ":No origin specified"
contents.zh-CHS: 409 ERR_NOORIGIN“：未指定原点”

contents.text: - PING or PONG message missing the originator parameter.
contents.zh-CHS: - PING或PONG消息缺少发起人参数。

contents.text:
411    ERR_NORECIPIENT
       ":No recipient given (<command>)"
412    ERR_NOTEXTTOSEND
       ":No text to send"
413    ERR_NOTOPLEVEL
       "<mask> :No toplevel domain specified"
414    ERR_WILDTOPLEVEL
       "<mask> :Wildcard in toplevel domain"
415    ERR_BADMASK
       "<mask> :Bad Server/host mask"

- 412 - 415 are returned by PRIVMSG to indicate that the message wasn't delivered for some reason. ERR_NOTOPLEVEL and ERR_WILDTOPLEVEL are errors that are returned when an invalid use of "PRIVMSG $<server>" or "PRIVMSG #<host>" is attempted.
contents.zh-CHS: - PRIVMSG返回412-415，以指示消息由于某种原因未被传递。ERR_NOTOPLEVEL和ERR_WILDTOPLEVEL是在尝试无效使用“PRIVMSG$<server>”或“PRIVMSG<host>”时返回的错误。

contents.text: 421 ERR_UNKNOWNCOMMAND "<command> :Unknown command"
contents.zh-CHS: 421 ERR_Unknown命令“<command>：未知命令”

contents.text: - Returned to a registered client to indicate that the command sent is unknown by the server.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回到已注册的客户端，以指示服务器未知发送的命令。

contents.text: 422 ERR_NOMOTD ":MOTD File is missing"
contents.zh-CHS: 422 ERR_NOMOTD“：MOTD文件丢失”

contents.text: - Server's MOTD file could not be opened by the server.
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务器无法打开服务器的MOTD文件。

contents.text: 423 ERR_NOADMININFO "<server> :No administrative info available"
contents.zh-CHS: 423 ERR_NOADMININFO“<server>：没有可用的管理信息”

contents.text: - Returned by a server in response to an ADMIN message when there is an error in finding the appropriate information.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在查找适当信息时出错时，由服务器响应管理消息返回。

contents.text:
424    ERR_FILEERROR
       ":File error doing <file op> on <file>"
- Generic error message used to report a failed file operation during the processing of a message.
contents.zh-CHS: - 通用错误消息，用于在消息处理过程中报告失败的文件操作。

contents.text: 431 ERR_NONICKNAMEGIVEN ":No nickname given"
contents.zh-CHS: 431 ERR_nonicknamagiven“：未给出昵称”

contents.text: - Returned when a nickname parameter expected for a command and isn't found.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当命令需要昵称参数但未找到时返回。

contents.text: 432 ERR_ERRONEUSNICKNAME "<nick> :Erroneous nickname"
contents.zh-CHS: 432错误的昵称“<nick>：错误的昵称”

contents.text: - Returned after receiving a NICK message which contains characters which do not fall in the defined set. See section 2.3.1 for details on valid nicknames.
contents.zh-CHS: - 收到包含不属于定义集的字符的尼克消息后返回。有关有效昵称的详细信息，请参见第2.3.1节。

contents.text: 433 ERR_NICKNAMEINUSE "<nick> :Nickname is already in use"
contents.zh-CHS: 433 ERR_昵称使用“<nick>：昵称已在使用”

contents.text: - Returned when a NICK message is processed that results in an attempt to change to a currently existing nickname.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在处理导致尝试更改为当前现有昵称的NICK消息时返回。

contents.text:
436    ERR_NICKCOLLISION
       "<nick> :Nickname collision KILL from <user>@<host>"
- Returned by a server to a client when it detects a nickname collision (registered of a NICK that already exists by another server).
contents.zh-CHS: - 当服务器检测到昵称冲突（另一台服务器已经存在的昵称的注册）时，服务器返回给客户端。

contents.text:
437    ERR_UNAVAILRESOURCE
       "<nick/channel> :Nick/channel is temporarily unavailable"
- Returned by a server to a user trying to join a channel currently blocked by the channel delay mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务器返回给试图加入当前被通道延迟机制阻止的通道的用户。

contents.text: - Returned by a server to a user trying to change nickname when the desired nickname is blocked by the nick delay mechanism.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当所需昵称被尼克延迟机制阻止时，服务器返回给试图更改昵称的用户。

contents.text:
441    ERR_USERNOTINCHANNEL
       "<nick> <channel> :They aren't on that channel"
- Returned by the server to indicate that the target user of the command is not on the given channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器返回，以指示命令的目标用户不在给定通道上。

contents.text: 442 ERR_NOTONCHANNEL "<channel> :You're not on that channel"
contents.zh-CHS: 442错误：你不在那个频道上

contents.text: - Returned by the server whenever a client tries to perform a channel affecting command for which the client isn't a member.
contents.zh-CHS: - 每当客户端尝试执行客户端不是其成员的影响通道的命令时，服务器返回。

contents.text:
443    ERR_USERONCHANNEL
       "<user> <channel> :is already on channel"
- Returned when a client tries to invite a user to a channel they are already on.
contents.zh-CHS: - 当客户端尝试邀请用户访问其已使用的频道时返回。

contents.text: 444 ERR_NOLOGIN "<user> :User not logged in"
contents.zh-CHS: 444错误登录“<user>：用户未登录”

contents.text: - Returned by the summon after a SUMMON command for a user was unable to be performed since they were not logged in.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由于用户未登录，无法执行用户的召唤命令后，召唤返回。

contents.text: 445 ERR_SUMMONDISABLED ":SUMMON has been disabled"
contents.zh-CHS: 445 ERR_召唤已禁用“：召唤已禁用”

contents.text: - Returned as a response to the SUMMON command. MUST be returned by any server which doesn't implement it.
contents.zh-CHS: - 作为对召唤命令的响应返回。必须由未实现它的任何服务器返回。

contents.text: 446 ERR_USERSDISABLED ":USERS has been disabled"
contents.zh-CHS: 446 ERR_USERSDISABLED“：用户已被禁用”

contents.text: - Returned as a response to the USERS command. MUST be returned by any server which does not implement it.
contents.zh-CHS: - 作为对用户命令的响应返回。必须由未实现它的任何服务器返回。

contents.text: 451 ERR_NOTREGISTERED ":You have not registered"
contents.zh-CHS: 451 ERR_notregisted“：您尚未注册”

contents.text: - Returned by the server to indicate that the client MUST be registered before the server will allow it to be parsed in detail.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器返回，指示必须先注册客户端，服务器才能允许对其进行详细分析。

contents.text: 461 ERR_NEEDMOREPARAMS "<command> :Not enough parameters"
contents.zh-CHS: 461 ERR_NEEDMOREPARAMS“<command>：参数不足”

contents.text: - Returned by the server by numerous commands to indicate to the client that it didn't supply enough parameters.
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务器通过大量命令返回，以指示客户端没有提供足够的参数。

contents.text: 462 ERR_ALREADYREGISTRED ":Unauthorized command (already registered)"
contents.zh-CHS: 462 ERR_ALREADYREGISTRED”：未经授权的命令（已注册）

contents.text: - Returned by the server to any link which tries to change part of the registered details (such as password or user details from second USER message).
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器返回到试图更改部分已注册详细信息（如第二条用户消息中的密码或用户详细信息）的任何链接。

contents.text: 463 ERR_NOPERMFORHOST ":Your host isn't among the privileged"
contents.zh-CHS: 463 ERR_NOPERMFORHOST“：您的主机不在特权范围内”

contents.text: - Returned to a client which attempts to register with a server which does not been setup to allow connections from the host the attempted connection is tried.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回到尝试向服务器注册的客户端，该服务器未设置为允许从主机进行连接尝试连接。

contents.text: 464 ERR_PASSWDMISMATCH ":Password incorrect"
contents.zh-CHS: 464 ERR_PASSWDMISMATCH“：密码不正确”

contents.text: - Returned to indicate a failed attempt at registering a connection for which a password was required and was either not given or incorrect.
contents.zh-CHS: - 返回以指示注册需要密码且未提供密码或密码不正确的连接的尝试失败。

contents.text: 465 ERR_YOUREBANNEDCREEP ":You are banned from this server"
contents.zh-CHS: 465 ERR_YOUREBANNEDCREEP“：您被禁止使用此服务器”

contents.text: - Returned after an attempt to connect and register yourself with a server which has been setup to explicitly deny connections to you.
contents.zh-CHS: - 尝试连接并向已设置为显式拒绝与您连接的服务器注册后返回。

contents.text: 466 ERR_YOUWILLBEBANNED
contents.zh-CHS: 你会被禁止的

contents.text: - Sent by a server to a user to inform that access to the server will soon be denied.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器发送给用户，通知对服务器的访问将很快被拒绝。

contents.text:
467    ERR_KEYSET
       "<channel> :Channel key already set"
471    ERR_CHANNELISFULL
       "<channel> :Cannot join channel (+l)"
472    ERR_UNKNOWNMODE
       "<char> :is unknown mode char to me for <channel>"
473    ERR_INVITEONLYCHAN
       "<channel> :Cannot join channel (+i)"
474    ERR_BANNEDFROMCHAN
       "<channel> :Cannot join channel (+b)"
475    ERR_BADCHANNELKEY
       "<channel> :Cannot join channel (+k)"
476    ERR_BADCHANMASK
       "<channel> :Bad Channel Mask"
477    ERR_NOCHANMODES
       "<channel> :Channel doesn't support modes"
478    ERR_BANLISTFULL
       "<channel> <char> :Channel list is full"
481 ERR_NOPRIVILEGES ":Permission Denied- You're not an IRC operator"
contents.zh-CHS: 481 ERR_NOPRIVILEGES“：权限被拒绝-您不是IRC操作员”

contents.text: - Any command requiring operator privileges to operate MUST return this error to indicate the attempt was unsuccessful.
contents.zh-CHS: - 任何需要操作员权限才能操作的命令都必须返回此错误，以表明尝试失败。

contents.text: 482 ERR_CHANOPRIVSNEEDED "<channel> :You're not channel operator"
contents.zh-CHS: 482错误频道需要“<channel>：您不是频道操作员”

contents.text: - Any command requiring 'chanop' privileges (such as MODE messages) MUST return this error if the client making the attempt is not a chanop on the specified channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果进行尝试的客户端不是指定通道上的chanop，则任何需要“chanop”权限（如模式消息）的命令都必须返回此错误。

contents.text: 483 ERR_CANTKILLSERVER ":You can't kill a server!"
contents.zh-CHS: 483 ERR_CANTKILLSERVER“：你不能杀死服务器！”

contents.text: - Any attempts to use the KILL command on a server are to be refused and this error returned directly to the client.
contents.zh-CHS: - 将拒绝在服务器上使用KILL命令的任何尝试，并将此错误直接返回给客户端。

contents.text: 484 ERR_RESTRICTED ":Your connection is restricted!"
contents.zh-CHS: 484 ERR_RESTRICTED:您的连接受到限制

contents.text: - Sent by the server to a user upon connection to indicate the restricted nature of the connection (user mode "+r").
contents.zh-CHS: - 在连接时由服务器发送给用户，以指示连接的受限性质（用户模式“+r”）。

contents.text: 485 ERR_UNIQOPPRIVSNEEDED ":You're not the original channel operator"
contents.zh-CHS: 485 ERR_uniqoprivsneed“：您不是原始频道运营商”

contents.text: - Any MODE requiring "channel creator" privileges MUST return this error if the client making the attempt is not a chanop on the specified channel.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果进行尝试的客户端不是指定通道上的chanop，则任何需要“通道创建者”权限的模式都必须返回此错误。

contents.text: 491 ERR_NOOPERHOST ":No O-lines for your host"
contents.zh-CHS: 491 ERR_NOOPERHOST“：主机无O型线”

contents.text: - If a client sends an OPER message and the server has not been configured to allow connections from the client's host as an operator, this error MUST be returned.
contents.zh-CHS: - 如果客户端发送OPER消息，而服务器尚未配置为允许以操作员身份从客户端主机进行连接，则必须返回此错误。

contents.text: 501 ERR_UMODEUNKNOWNFLAG ":Unknown MODE flag"
contents.zh-CHS: 501 ERR_UMODEUNKNOWNFLAG“：未知模式标志”

contents.text: - Returned by the server to indicate that a MODE message was sent with a nickname parameter and that the a mode flag sent was not recognized.
contents.zh-CHS: - 由服务器返回，以指示发送了带有昵称参数的模式消息，并且未识别发送的模式标志。

contents.text: 502 ERR_USERSDONTMATCH ":Cannot change mode for other users"
contents.zh-CHS: 502 ERR_USERSDONTMATCH“：无法更改其他用户的模式”

contents.text: - Error sent to any user trying to view or change the user mode for a user other than themselves.
contents.zh-CHS: - 发送给任何试图查看或更改用户模式的用户（而非他们自己）的错误。

contents.text: 5.3 Reserved numerics
contents.zh-CHS: 5.3 保留数字

contents.text: These numerics are not described above since they fall into one of the following categories:
contents.zh-CHS: 以上未对这些数字进行描述，因为它们属于以下类别之一：

contents.text: 1. no longer in use;
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 不再使用；

contents.text: 2. reserved for future planned use;
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 保留供将来计划使用；

contents.text: 3. in current use but are part of a non-generic 'feature' of the current IRC server.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 但属于当前IRC服务器的非通用“功能”的一部分。

contents.text: 6. Current implementations
contents.zh-CHS: 6. 当前实现

contents.text: The IRC software, version 2.10 is the only complete implementation of the IRC protocol (client and server). Because of the small amount of changes in the client protocol since the publication of RFC 1459 [IRC], implementations that follow it are likely to be compliant with this protocol or to require a small amount of changes to reach compliance.
contents.zh-CHS: IRC软件版本2.10是IRC协议（客户端和服务器）的唯一完整实现。由于自RFC 1459[IRC]发布以来，客户机协议中发生了少量更改，因此遵循该协议的实现很可能符合该协议，或者需要进行少量更改才能达到法规遵从性。

contents.text: 7. Current problems
contents.zh-CHS: 7. 当前问题

contents.text: There are a number of recognized problems with the IRC Client Protocol, and more generally with the IRC Server Protocol. In order to preserve backward compatibility with old clients, this protocol has almost not evolved since the publication of RFC 1459 [IRC].
contents.zh-CHS: IRC客户机协议和IRC服务器协议都存在许多公认的问题。为了保持与旧客户端的向后兼容性，自RFC1459[IRC]发布以来，该协议几乎没有发展。

contents.text: 7.1 Nicknames
contents.zh-CHS: 7.1 绰号

contents.text: The idea of the nickname on IRC is very convenient for users to use when talking to each other outside of a channel, but there is only a finite nickname space and being what they are, it's not uncommon for several people to want to use the same nick. If a nickname is chosen by two people using this protocol, either one will not succeed or both will removed by use of a server KILL (See Section 3.7.1).
contents.zh-CHS: IRC上昵称的概念非常方便用户在频道外相互交谈时使用，但昵称空间有限，因此，多人使用同一个昵称并不罕见。如果使用此协议的两个人选择了一个昵称，则其中一个不会成功，或者两个昵称都将通过使用服务器终止来删除（参见第3.7.1节）。

contents.text: 7.2 Limitation of wildcards
contents.zh-CHS: 7.2 通配符的限制

contents.text: There is no way to escape the escape character "\" (%x5C). While this isn't usually a problem, it makes it impossible to form a mask with a backslash character ("\") preceding a wildcard.
contents.zh-CHS: 无法转义转义字符“\”（%x5C）。虽然这通常不是一个问题，但它使在通配符之前使用反斜杠字符（\）形成掩码变得不可能。

contents.text: 7.3 Security considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 7.3 安全考虑

contents.text: Security issues related to this protocol are discussed in the "IRC Server Protocol" [IRC-SERVER] as they are mostly an issue for the server side of the connection.
contents.zh-CHS: “IRC服务器协议”[IRC-Server]中讨论了与此协议相关的安全问题，因为它们主要是连接服务器端的问题。
